notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: KLB, DJH, RB and KLP conceived the idea for the study and KLB is leading the trial. KLB, RB, YW and AF obtained funding for the study. KLB, DJH, RB and KLP designed the trial protocol with input from BRM, JE, JK, FC, YW, AF, BHW, DC and JL. KLP is coordinating the trial and BRM, JE and VD are site coordinators. JK and AF designed and will conduct the statistical analyses and AH designed and will conduct the health economic analysis. YW and FC will analyse MRI outcomes, SY will read the baseline radiographs and BHW will perform the cytokine and growth factor analyses. DC and JL will perform PRP and saline injections. KLP and KLB drafted the manuscript with input from DJH, BRM, JE, VD, JK, YW, SY, RB, FC, AF, AH, BHW, DC, and JL. All authors helped draft and critically review the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
